attributes.action: O2 to give the 87 pence per customer compensation,to the homeless in the uk.
attributes.background:
Over the last day or so the service o2 provided has been limited and not fit for purpose. o2 are now offering 87 pence per customer in way of compensation.
Please sign this to ask that o2 give that 87 pence per pay out, to the homeless shelter charities in the uk, if agreed too by the customer.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This would the responsibility of O2.
